title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 495-1.14 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 495-1.14 - Severability

State Regulations

Each part of this Part is deemed severable, and in the
event that any part of this Part is held to be invalid, the remainder of this

Part shall continue in full force and effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
495-1.14

Adopted

New

York State Register December 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 52, eff. 1/9/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
